languages.text: "Эттфатер, дурная молва идет о деяниях твоих. Дурные дела творятся твоей рукой нередко. Не по закону, данному Всеотцом, ты живешь, потому прошу — остановись, пока не заш{mf|ел|ла} слишком далеко. Не хочу за спасение платить тебе расправой".

"Your actions have earned you a grim reputation, Aett-Vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."
languages.original_text: "Эттфатер, дурная молва идет о деяниях твоих. Дурные дела творятся твоей рукой нередко. Не по закону, данному Всеотцом, ты живешь, потому прошу — остановись, пока не заш{mf|ел|ла} слишком далеко. Не хочу за спасение платить тебе расправой".

traits.locale_text: "Your actions have earned you ill fame among people, Aett-vater. Ill deeds are committed at your hands quite often. Whatever law you live by is not the law given by the Allfather. And therefore I am asking you, please stop before you come too far. I would loathe to exact judgment upon my own saviour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your actions have earned you ill fame among people, Aett-vater. Ill deeds are committed at your hands quite often. Whatever law you live by is not the law given by the Allfather. And therefore I am asking you, please stop before you come too far. I would loathe to exact judgment upon my own saviour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your actions have earned you a bad reputation, Aett-vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your actions have earned you a bad reputation, Aett-vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your actions have earned you a grim reputation, Aett-Vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your actions have earned you a grim reputation, Aett-Vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Sus actos le han granjeado una reputación oscura, Aett-Vater. Sus manos han cometido demasiadas fechorías. No vive según los preceptos establecidos por el Padre de todas las cosas, y por eso le pido que pare antes de llegar demasiado lejos. Detestaría tener que castigar a la persona que me ha salvado la vida».
languages.original_text: "Your actions have earned you a grim reputation, Aett-Vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."

traits.locale_text: «Sus actos le han granjeado una mala reputación, Aett-vater. Sus manos han cometido demasiadas fechorías. No vive según los preceptos establecidos por el Padre de todas las cosas, y por eso le pido que pare antes de llegar demasiado lejos. Detestaría tener que castigar a la persona que me ha salvado la vida».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你的行为玷污了你的名声，狼领。很多时候，邪恶的后果都是你一手造成的。你没有遵循全父给予你的法则行事，我请求你赶紧停下来，否则就来不及了。我可不想亲手惩戒我的救命恩人。”
languages.original_text: "Your actions have earned you a grim reputation, Aett-Vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."

traits.locale_text: “你的行为玷污了你的名声，狼领。很多时候，坏事都是你一手造成的。你没有遵循全父给予你的法则行事，我请求你赶紧停下来，否则就来不及了。我可不想亲手惩戒我的救命恩人。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Vos actes vous ont valu une bien triste réputation, aett-vater. Vous vous êtes {mf|rendu|rendue} coupable de trop nombreux méfaits, au mépris de la loi du Père de Tous, c'est pourquoi je vous demande de vous arrêter avant d'aller trop loin. Je m'en voudrais de devoir châtier {mf|celui|celle} qui m'a sauvé. »
languages.original_text: "Your actions have earned you a grim reputation, Aett-Vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."

traits.locale_text: « Vos actes vous ont valu une bien mauvaise réputation, aett-vater. Vous vous êtes {mf|rendu|rendue} coupable de trop nombreux méfaits, au mépris de la loi du Père de Tous, c'est pourquoi je vous demande de vous arrêter avant d'aller trop loin. Je m'en voudrais de devoir châtier {mf|celui|celle} qui m'a sauvé. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「お前のやり口は、あまり評判は良くないぞ、アエット＝ヴァテル。お前の手によって、あまりにも多くの悪行が行われてきた。お前は全知の父から与えられた法に従って生きていない、だが、俺はお前が手遅れになる前に止めたいんだ。自分を救ってくれた相手を罰したくはないのでな」
languages.original_text: "Your actions have earned you a grim reputation, Aett-Vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."

traits.locale_text: 「お前のやり口は、あまり評判は良くないぞ、アエット＝ヴァテル。お前の手によって、あまりにも多くの悪行が行われてきた。お前は全知の父から与えられた法に従って生きていない、だが、俺はお前が手遅れになる前に止めたいんだ。自分を救ってくれた相手を罰したくはないのでな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Taten haben Euch einen schlechten Ruf eingebracht, Aett-Vater. Zu oft wurden durch Eure Hand böse Taten verübt. Ihr lebt nicht nach dem Gesetz, das der Allvater uns gegeben hat. Ich bitte Euch daher, haltet ein, ehe Ihr zu weit geht. Ich möchte {mf|meinen eigenen Retter|meine eigene Retterin} ungern bestrafen müssen."
languages.original_text: "Your actions have earned you a grim reputation, Aett-Vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Taten haben Euch einen schlechten Ruf eingebracht, Aett-Vater. Zu oft wurden durch Eure Hand böse Taten verübt. Ihr lebt nicht nach dem Gesetz, das der Allvater uns gegeben hat. Ich bitte Euch daher, haltet ein, ehe Ihr zu weit geht. Ich möchte {mf|meinen eigenen Retter|meine eigene Retterin} ungern bestrafen müssen."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Yaptıkların, itibarını yerle bir ediyor Aett-Vater. Kötü işler eyledin. Yücebaba'nın kurallarına aykırı hareket ediyorsun, fazla ileri gitmeden durmanı rica ediyorum. Kurtarıcım olarak gördüğüm {mf|adamı|kadını} cezalandırmak istemem."
languages.original_text: "Your actions have earned you a grim reputation, Aett-Vater. Ill deeds have too often been done by your hand. You do not live according to the law given by the Allfather, and so I ask you to stop before you go too far. I am loath to visit punishment upon my own saviour."

traits.locale_text: "Yaptıkların itibarını yerle bir ediyor Aett-Vater. Ellerini kötü eylemlere bulaştırdın. Yücebaba'nın kurallarına aykırı hareket ediyorsun, fazla ileri gitmeden durmanı rica ediyorum. Kendi kahramanıma ceza vermek istemem."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
